raw.question: Created @agent-relay/sdk package with npm workspaces
raw.reasoning: Lightweight SDK for integrators. Separate package allows independent versioning and minimal dependencies.

retrospective.summary: Created @agent-relay/sdk package with npm workspaces structure. SDK includes protocol types, framing, and RelayClient. All 1990 tests passing.
